LanguageData.VBE_MakeCoffeeFast.label: make espresso coffee
LanguageData.VBE_MakeCoffeeFast.description: Make a warm, bitter beverage usually complemented with milk and sugar. A favorite among students and office workers across the galaxy due to high caffeine content and pleasing aroma. Brewing coffee in a espresso machine is generally much faster.
LanguageData.VBE_ReheatCoffee.label: reheat iced coffee
LanguageData.VBE_ReheatCoffee.description: This espresso machine has a small built-in grill to reheat iced coffee.
LanguageData.VBE_BrewLatteCoffee.label: brew latte coffee
LanguageData.VBE_BrewLatteCoffee.description: Brew a potent espresso mixed with fresh milk to help ease bitterness before pouring and serving. Lattes have a reputation of being particularly meant for “sophisticated” individuals.
LanguageData.VBE_BrewMochaCoffee.label: brew mocha coffee
LanguageData.VBE_BrewMochaCoffee.description: Brew a coffee mixed with sweet and luxurious chocolate. Those of snobbish persuasion would argue mocha is more of a dessert than an actual coffee drink.
LanguageData.VBE_BrewIrishCoffee.label: brew irish coffee
LanguageData.VBE_BrewIrishCoffee.description: Brew a drink made with whiskey and coffee blended thoroughly before forming a head and being topped with a spoonful of whipped cream. Perfect for those who just got out of bed and are already wanting to go back to it.
LanguageData.VBE_BrewCannibalCoffee.label: brew cannibal coffee
LanguageData.VBE_BrewCannibalCoffee.description: Brew a drink... for a very particular... refined coffee drinker.
LanguageData.VBE_MakeTeaFast.label: make fast tea
LanguageData.VBE_MakeTeaFast.description: Make a pleasing, aromatic beverage prepared by steeping a bag of tea leaves in boiling water. Brewing tea in this specially prepared espresso machine is generally much faster.
LanguageData.VBE_MakeBlackTea.label: make black tea
LanguageData.VBE_MakeBlackTea.description: Make a particularly bitter tea cut with creamy milk, wakes one up a bit and relaxes one's mind.
LanguageData.VBE_MakeYuenYeung.label: make yuenyeung
LanguageData.VBE_MakeYuenYeung.description: Make a mixture of coffee and tea. Tea and coffee drinkers respectively set their differences aside while concocting this unholy amalgamation. Whether it’s served hot or cold it’s equally confusing to the imbiber.
LanguageData.VBE_MakeKombucha.label: make kombucha tea
LanguageData.VBE_MakeKombucha.description: Make a sugary tea left out to ferment, after fermenting the end product is a sweet and sour, sometimes even naturally fizzy drink known as kombucha. Praised for health benefits, though some remain skeptical.
